'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
As the only accessible interior location in the small district of [[Lifter's Refuge]], this typical Dunnage home is host to a band of godlike pirates and their leader [[Captain Tatzatl]].

It is only accessible during the quest [[The Man of Chimes]].

==Characters==
* [[Captain Tatzatl]], the moon godlike who introduces himself as you enter.
* [[Giacolo]], captured animancer from the [[Vailian Republics]]
* [[Black Magretta]], fire godlike.
* [[Naudr]], death godlike.
* [[Naudra]], another death godlike.
* [[Himuati Five Stones]], nature godlike.
* [[Li'l Woody]] door woman, nature godlike.
title: Dunnage House
